long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
eBay Reviews Extractor extension allows you to scrape and export complete product or store review data for easy analysis. Its intuitive interface makes it accessible to anyone, regardless of coding experience.

How the Tool Works
1. Open any product page on eBay.com.
2. Click "Download Reviews" under the product name or "Download Store Reviews" under the store name.
3. Wait for the process to complete, then click "Download Reviews" in the popup area to download the data in CSV, JSON, or XLSX format.
4. (Optional) Click the "AI Review Summary" button to generate a detailed analysis, including advantages, disadvantages, improvement suggestions, and a recommendation on whether to buy or not.

The extracted CSV, JSON, or XLSX file conveniently organizes all key review information, including ID, Username, Rating, Rating Star, Rating Star Text, Comment, Context Rating Score, Context Time, follow-up feedback, Product Name, Product URL, Review URL, and Scraped Time.

Unlock Valuable Insights
With the eBay Reviews Scraper, e-commerce professionals can quickly conduct competitive research, monitor trends, compare products and stores, identify opportunities, and make data-driven decisions. Say goodbye to the tedious task of manual review analysis and embrace the power of instant insights.

AI Review Summary
The ChatGPT-Powered AI Review Summary feature takes your analysis to the next level, providing a comprehensive overview of the advantages, disadvantages, improvement suggestions, and a recommendation on whether to buy or not, based on the extracted reviews.

The data extraction process begins immediately after you make a request, with the duration varying based on the amount of information needing retrieval.

Data Privacy 
The data you work with remains confined to your local machine and does not traverse our servers at any point.

Disclaimer 
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with eBay.
